mapper.select: SELECT * FROM citys WHERE `name` = #{cityName} AND levelType = 2
SELECT * FROM citys WHERE mergerName LIKE '%${cityName}%'
SELECT t.id, t.parentId AS townId, (SELECT parentId FROM citys WHERE id = t.parentId) AS provinceId FROM citys t WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT /*区县*/ CASE t.levelType WHEN 0 THEN '' WHEN 1 THEN '' WHEN 2 THEN '' ELSE t.id END AS id, /*市*/ CASE t.levelType WHEN 0 THEN '' WHEN 1 THEN '' WHEN 2 THEN t.id ELSE t.parentId END AS townId, /*省*/ CASE t.levelType WHEN 0 THEN '' WHEN 1 THEN t.id WHEN 2 THEN t.parentId ELSE (SELECT parentId FROM citys WHERE id = t.parentId) END AS provinceId FROM citys t WHERE id = #{id}
